content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Forensics workspaces provide quick link to related tasks December 11, 2023—Workspaces in Forensics now offer a quick link to all tasks related to the workspace. Click the Related Tasks button to go to a pre-filtered list in the Task List tab where you can view the status and results of workspace-related tasks. Agentic SIEM & XDR → Forensics © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
